description:
Let's Destroy Huge Bosses and dodge thousand of bullets ...
It's time to save the universe one more time!

7 modes:
- Story (with 4 difficulties: EASY - NORMAL - HARD- NIGHTMARE), 
- Arcade, 
- Manic (no healthbar for player), 
- The Line, 
- 7 Challenges, 
- 56 Puzzle-Maps (Color-Reflex Mode / A Match 3 with bullets!)
- Boss-Rush! 

- 2 spaceships (+ 1 unlockable), 
- 50 alien artifacts to collect, 
- 10 space cows to find, 
- 70 "In Game Achievements", 
- Local Leaderboards for all modes and difficulties, 
- A great original instrumental rock soundtrack! (Fully listenable from the game menu.)
name: Overdriven Reloaded: Special Edition
intro:
The HD shoot' em up: vertical, fast & fun! 
Relive the pleasures of arcade shoot'em ups in plenty
of game modes, from 1 to 4 players in Local Co-op.
